descriptions.STORM: a thunderstorm raging with pounding rain and crashing thunder
descriptions.THUN: thunder cracking sharply and rumbling with deep rolling bass
descriptions.WHSTHmn: a person whistling a tune with a clear breathy melodic trill
descriptions.WHSTMech: a mechanical steam or referee whistle blasting a piercing shriek
descriptions.WHSTMisc: a whistle producing a sharp sustained high-pitched piping note
descriptions.WINDDsgn: artificially generated wind whooshing with a smooth synthetic sweep
descriptions.WIND: steady natural wind blowing with gusts and a rushing airy flow
descriptions.WINDGust: a sudden sharp gust of wind buffeting past with a brief rush
descriptions.WINDInt: wind whistling and moaning through window cracks and narrow gaps
descriptions.WINDTonl: wind howling through wires and poles with a sustained eerie whistle
descriptions.WINDTurb: extremely violent wind roaring and battering with sustained destructive gusts
descriptions.WINDVege: wind rustling through trees and leaves with a soft whooshing sway
descriptions.WNDWCover: window blinds pulling and curtains sliding on a rod with a swish
descriptions.WNDWHdwr: a window latch snapping and crank handle turning with a grinding ratchet
descriptions.WNDWKnck: knuckles tapping and rapping on glass with a bright hollow knock
descriptions.WNDWMetl: a metal-framed window sliding in its channel and clicking shut
descriptions.WNDWMisc: a window opening or closing with a general sliding and latching
descriptions.WNDWPlas: a vinyl-framed window sliding with a soft rubbery friction squeak
descriptions.WNDWWood: a wooden window frame creaking open and thumping shut with a rattle
descriptions.WINGBird: bird wings flapping rapidly with a feathery whooshing flutter
descriptions.WINGCrea: large creature wings beating heavily with powerful gusting flaps
descriptions.WINGInsc: insect wings buzzing rapidly with a high-pitched droning vibration
descriptions.WINGMisc: wings flapping and beating with a general whooshing fluttery pulse
descriptions.WOODBrk: wood splintering and cracking apart with a sharp fibrous snap
descriptions.WOODCrsh: wooden structures crashing together with splintering fracturing debris
descriptions.WOODFric: wood creaking and groaning under stress with rubbing friction squeaks
descriptions.WOODHndl: a wooden object being picked up and set down with a solid clunk
descriptions.WOODImpt: a solid piece of wood struck with a deep dense resonant thock
descriptions.WOODMisc: wood producing a general hollow clunking or low creaking
descriptions.WOODMvmt: wooden pieces sliding and shuffling together with dry rattles
descriptions.WOODTonl: wood resonating with a warm ringing overtone when bowed or struck
